affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
STUN DELAY: 0.35
RADIUS: 150 / 175 / 200 / 225
STUN DURATION: 2
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/125/140/160
COOLDOWN: 9
desc: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.
notes:
Split Earth will destroy trees in its area of effect.
There is a 0.35 second delay before the effect is applied.
lore: Twisting nature to his vile will, the shifting earth consumes those unlucky enough to cross Leshrac's path.
name: leshrac_split_earth

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Physical
cmb:
MANA COST: 95/120/135/155
COOLDOWN: 22
desc: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal mixed damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Lasts 10 seconds.
notes:
Damage is not reduced by damage block.
The explosions will continue even if Leshrac is killed.
Can damage buildings, magic immune units, and invisible units. Deals 40% more damage to tower
lore: Chronoptic energy bursts from one plane to the other, evaporating anything it touches.
name: leshrac_diabolic_edict

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 90/100/110/120
COOLDOWN: 4
desc: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then jumps to nearby enemy units.
notes: The lightning searches in a 650 area. Slows its targets by 75% for 0.75 seconds.
lore: The Tormented Soul's mastery of the elements is evident in the massive storms that strike down armies before him.
name: leshrac_lightning_storm

affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Toggle
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
MANA/SEC: 20 / 40 / 60
RADIUS: 450
DAMAGE: 100 / 130 / 160
SCEPTER DAMAGE: 160 / 190 / 220
cmb:
MANA COST: 70/90/110
COOLDOWN: 1
desc:
Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Will not deal damage if Leshrac is invisible.
lore: If necessary, the Tormented Soul can manipulate space time itself, ravaging lesser beings.
name: leshrac_pulse_nova
